DOC.brief_summary: Skin Carotenoid Scores ( SCS ) biomarker overall antioxidant status . This study use Raman Spectroscopy examine ability increase dietary intake fruit vegetable increase SCS medical student . This observational , non-invasive study examine skin carotenoid level time individual increase intake dietary adjustment . Thirty medical student meeting study inclusion criterion ask increase intake high antioxidant fruit vegetable 4-6 cup per day eight week period time . Students self-select fruit vegetable give list receive supermarket gift card offset cost increase food . Students ask follow usual diet one week . Then increase intake high antioxidant fruit vegetable 4-6 cup per day eight week . Then return usual diet 2 week . SCS score take baseline week 1 . At begin week 2 , student ask increase fruit vegetable intake 4-6 cup per day . SCS measure every two week 8-week intervention phase . Students return usual diet 2 week SCS measure end 2-week period .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Changes Skin Carotenoid Scores Medical Students Following Dietary Interventions
DOC.detailed_description: Inclusion criterion : - Medical student ( year ) Texas Tech School Medicine - BMI 20-29 - Non-smoker , non-pregnant Exclusion criterion : - Individuals suffer chronic disease diabetes , heart disease , metabolic disorder - Pregnant woman - Smokers - Individuals BMI > = 30 < = 19
DOC.criteria: Medical student year Texas Tech University School Medicine willing maintain increase consumption fruit vegetable entire eightweek experimental period , maintain logs report time measurement take . Pregnancy Smoker BMI =/ > 30 Chronic disease diabetes , heart disease , metabolic disorder
